Интересная кооператив игра с видом от первого лица. Если вам хочется просто поубивать толпы монстров и зомби с друзьями, то эта игра подойдет вам. Максимальный кооператив на сервере который я видел, доходит до 48 человек. Это просто месиво! Играть в 48 человек против одной волны в 1800 монстров. Тут множество классов, пушек и т.д. Только вот графика деревянная, но это мелочи. Есть тут и хардкорная музычка типо тяжолого рока и метала.

A great party game.  It's nothing too serious, so don't let "dude-bro" gamers try to make you feel the need to be "pro or go home."  Run and gun and stick together.  Take down some Zed with friends or random people in a server.  It's just good fun taking down monsters and doesn't need to be more than that.

Графон не айс но я как бы всё понимаю пишу обзор с 2014г,сама задумка не плохая,интерфейс боя удачный,большое количество зомби,волнами, что очень большой + с добычей денег проблем не бывает ну это наверное у кого как),оружие с приличной отдачей у такой отдаче свой+ и - в одном букете,очень легко попасти в голову даже без прицела,много уровней,а так же много длс очень много дона трудно быть на равных,но я всегда 1!=)Если закрыть глаза на то что вы бегаете всегда в одном костюме без "длс" и нельзя купить хорошее оружие "длс" то игра бомба..Первые впечатления оказались неизгладимыми. Я начал одиночную игру на легкой. Внимательно изучив все перки, я выбрал коммандос, потому что штурмовые винтовки мне более по душе (как далее оказалось, секира Dwarfs!? куда веселее). В первые же минуты игры я ощутил весь хоррор игры, я спрятался в комнатке с человеком, которого прибили к какой-то мишени. Эти твари окружали меня, я поддавался панике и палил во все стороны. К моему удивлению, я выжил и убил всех. А что дальше? Жестокая шутка! Я должен в одиночку убить босса! Окончательно отчаившись, я вышел на открытую местность и превратился в суриката. Выпустив всю обойму прямо ему в башку, я завопил, как будто вышел из ловушки Джона Крамера по прозвищу Пила. Враг пал. Моё сердце колотилось. Я вырубил игру и поблагодарил друга, за то, что он мне её посоветовал.
Я продолжал играть в неё, набирался опыта, изучал карты и решил сменить уровень сложности. Вскоре осознал, что мне пора выйти в свет и показать себя в кооперативной игре. Что же я увидел? Кучку оболтусов, которые покупают внеклассовое оружие, палят в мясника из пистолета и в одиночку пытаются настрелять отбивальщику из какой-то пуколки. Мне открылся странный парадокс: чем меньше отряд, тем легче играть. 
Товарищи! Играйте лучше в одиночную, не нужно портить жизнь остальным. Всем спасибо за внимание.8/10

Народ,мож игра и оригинальна для своего жанра,но игра затягивает этим месиловом! Когда ты истребляешь толпы монстров тебе это даёт кайф и почему-то ты хочешь играть дальше. Графончик не ах,но на уровне,для этой игры этого достаточно,он сделан не очень для игроков с хреновыми компами,чтобы побольше людей могли в неё сыграть. Оружия достаточно чтобы пережить несколько волн + DLC в которые тоже входят неплохие оружки. Игра достаточно хороша,советую всем сыграть!

To me, Killing Floor is a fantastically cheap alternative to CoD Zombies, or any other Zombie co-op stage survival game. You play it obsessively for days or weeks, then get tired of it and give it a rest for a couple of months, only to come back at it again with a vengeance. I do that with Killing Floor, the same way I do it with COD Zombies, surival mode on Resident Evil or L4D. Good solid, co-op survival game.
 Lots of fun to be had. Lots of breaks to be taken, and lots of resuming the intensity later.

This game has endless replayability. The fact that there are perks in the game almost makes you feel like your playing an rpg except with Zeds (mutants). I have spent 140 hours playing this game and it is very fun and im not thinking of stopping anytime soon. Its quite fun to play by yourself however eventually that can get tedious so if you really want to have some fun in this game buy a copy for you and a friend and youll be able to enjoy killing mutants for hours. There are a wide array of DLC's to buy which include character skins, weapon skins and new weapons. Personally the prices of these DLC's can be a bit expensive so I recommend getting them in a sale. The weapon packs are very much worth it because you can never have to many weapons to play around with. Theres even a steampunk weapon pack. Anyway would recommend this game im giving it 9/10 with its only con being expensive DLC's.

Каждый уродец - очень опасен и убить его не так просто ) , более хардкорная ( отсутствует прицел , приходится целиться вручную ; некоторые монстры убивают с пары ударов уже на normal , что придаёт дикое напряжение ) . В общем всем советую .

Killing Floor is the pinnacle of the  co-op zombie arena-based FPS genre. Forget Nazi Zombies, this is the real shit. Killing Floor is about one thing and one thing only: shooting zombies and staying alive. 

Okay, that was too things, but you get the idea. There's no "story mode" over-saturated with sappy exposition or even that many modes outside of the basic survival and objective game types. Thanks to the combined efforts of Tripwire Interactive and the modding community, this game does one thing really well and manages to do so with a huge helping of content to enjoy. There's plenty of maps to play, from an old English pub to the moon to the depths of Hell and everywhere in-between. In each stage, the premise is the same: you are being assaulted from all sides by bloodthirsty mutants Left 4 Dead style, with no where to go. If you've played Nazi Zombies or Left 4 Dead by this point, you oughta know the procedure by know.

You can play on your own on a lower difficulty for a scarier survival experience, or with a few buddies for a more coordinated murderfest. For extra depth, you can pick from one of several classes, each with their own perks that become more useful over time as you level up. If you don't care about any of that though, Killing Floor can still be a great game for when you have that itch to just shoot something, or if you want to hang out with a few buddies online and enjoy some zombie murderin' together.

But just what makes Killing Floor the best of its kind isn't the abundance of combat or the simplicity of its game modes. Killing Floor has we like to call "hella good game feel" That is, the guns just "feel" good to fire. They all have weight, heft and serious recoil to them, combined with extremely satisfying sound assets. No matter how many times you shoot a Clot's head off with a double barrel shotgun, it never gets old, and really, it never should.

If you really enjoyed 28 Days Later and wanted to experience that kind of frantic, fast-paced British zombie slaying action, you've come to the right place.

[h1] Killing Floor Review [/h1]

[u] Short Decription  [/u]
Killing Floor is truly a masterpeice of a game,a simple but yet fun and addictive game to play with yourself and with your friends!. Killing Floor is a 6 player co-op horde shooter where you battle it out with waves of mutated genetic freaks and earn money for oblidorating them and using that money to buy better gear between waves at the Trader.
Killing Floor also features a Perk System which has 7 diffrent perks to pick from [b] ( Field medic, Support specialist, Sharpshooter, Commando, Berserker, Firebug and Demolition.)  [/b]
with each level you earn, the higher the benefits of your perk will be, getting you more discounts on perk specific weapons and more damage for those weapons and other perk related attributes of the sort.

[h1] Run down of the Game [/h1]

[h1] Multiplayer [/h1]
The comunnity for Killing Floor is large and healthy, many active players and active servers to join and play in
just make sure to play on servers appropriate for your level of skill and perk, playing on Hell on earth servers is not exactly where you wanna start your game in.

[h1] Mod support/Developer support [/h1]
Killing Floor has been supported by the developers ever since 5 years ago when it came out on Steam, giving a large amount of patches and fixes for the game along with a ton of Weapons that were added in during special events (Christmas, Halloween, ect) also re-skinning the zeds to fit the theme of the holiday.
in terms of mods Killing Floor itself was originaly built off a Mod for Unreal2004 so it would be no suprise to see the game have very big mod support, a ton of community made maps and other mods (Weapons, Charaters, Zeds, ect)
i would recommend to play a bit of Killing Floor Vanila before trying out the mods so that you will not be confused what is a regular part of the base game.

[h1] Performance  [/h1]
For a game running on an outdated/aging engine, Killing Floor is quite amazing till this very day.
using the old unreal engine to its limits and allowing huge mod support with the SDK.
Running Killing Floor should not be a problem to anyone with a low-end PC, (unless you are trying to run the game with a Potato of a computor)

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]
Killing Floor is quite a solid and polished FPS, having some of the best gunplay i have ever expirenced in a game
giving the player a large amount of options and guns to use.
Teamwork is a very important part of the game when playing on higher diffculties or playing in general with other poeple
everyone in the team has a responsibility to take and can contribute to the team with the skill set they have
(Field medic healing poeple (duhh). Support keeping doors welded and crowd controling zeds with his shotgun, Demolition blowing shit up, ect ect)

[h1] Final notes [/h1]
Killing Floor is definetly a must have for any fan of horde shooters and cooprative games, you will be playing for hours and might want to get a group of friends to enjoy it twice as much!
like i said before, please know what you are doing and dont go running off into Hell on Earth servers at Level 0
you also might wanna pick up some weapon DLC, (yeah we all hate buying DLC but this DLC is realy good and the developers deserve the money for this!) there is also alot of cosmetic charater packs you can pick up to add a bit of style to your charater, but they aren't essential nor do you get any special benefits from them.
I can't wait for Killing Floor 2 and i bet you can't wait aswell, so hop into Killing Floor and have a blast and prepare your ass for Killing Floor 2.

✍ИГРОВОЙ ПРОЦЕСС:♝
В игре Вас забрасывают на карту, где Вы один или же с напарниками должны выдержать некоторое колличество волн мутантов, после которых появляется сам ученый по прозвищу Патриарх. Убивая врагов Вы получаете деньги, а также накапливается опыт, переходя на следующие уровни перков. После окончании волны, можно посетить торговца у которого осуществляется покупка различного вооружения и экипировки. Также с каждой следующей волной появляются противники намного опасней чем предыдущие.
